title: FS: 1911 Northwestern College (WI) Champions Postcard - Price Reduced
author: fkm_bky

posts.post_title: FS: 1911 Northwestern College (WI) Champions Postcard - Price Reduced
posts.post_content:
1911 College Champions postcard.  Some writing on the back, but clean image on front.  This is from Northwestern College in Watertown, WI.  - see post below with a few more details shared by another member.

$30.00 - Paypal delivered F&F

Please PM or email (madkaz44@hotmail.com) if interested.  I can also provide higher res scans if needed.

Thank you!

Bill

Bump - Price reduced to $50.00.

Thanks!

Bill

This is from the 1911 team, that is pictured:

05 04 1911      NORTH WESTERN DEFEATED BY BEE-DEE Co

The Bee-Dee Co. team opened the season with a victory by defeating the strong North Western College team on the college campus by the score of 6 to 3.  George Richards did the twirling for the Bee-Dees and pitched first class ball while Miller did good work behind the bat.  Berg, Masch and Mahnke were the batteries for the college boys.  Unfortunately the stunt Creuz tried to perform and pick up the ball with his teeth turned out to be a fizzle and allowed the N.W.C. team their runs, who might have left the diamond with but one run to their credit had it not been for this incident.

[quote name="buymycards" post=2021420]This is from the 1911 team, that is pictured:

05 04 1911      NORTH WESTERN DEFEATED BY BEE-DEE Co

The Bee-Dee Co. team opened the season with a victory by defeating the strong North Western College team on the college campus by the score of 6 to 3.  George Richards did the twirling for the Bee-Dees and pitched first class ball while Miller did good work behind the bat.  Berg, Masch and Mahnke were the batteries for the college boys.  Unfortunately the stunt Creuz tried to perform and pick up the ball with his teeth turned out to be a fizzle and allowed the N.W.C. team their runs, who might have left the diamond with but one run to their credit had it not been for this incident.[/QUOTE]

Very cool Rick! Thank you for sharing more background on this!

Bill

Bump and price reduction to $30.00 shipped.  F&F Paypal preferred.

Thanks!

Bill
